mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: I didn`t reveal anything that I should have kept to myself.
sentences.chinese: 我没有暴露出任何我应该守口如瓶的秘密。

sentences.english: The parents complained that the children were so secretive and never told them anything.
sentences.chinese: 你母抱怨孩子守口如瓶，什么事也不告诉他们。

sentences.english: He received an (anonymous) letter telling him to keep his mouth shut.
sentences.chinese: 他收到了一封匿名信，被告知要守口如瓶。

sentences.english: The amazing thing was that no-one in the club said a word.
sentences.chinese: 最好的是俱乐部的每个人都对交易守口如瓶。

sentences.english: She was bursting to announce the news but was sworn to secrecy .
sentences.chinese: 她急不可待想宣布这个消息，但却发过誓要守口如瓶。

sentences.english: That tight-lipped custom might have been an early form of environmental protection.
sentences.chinese: 这种守口如瓶的习俗可能正是环保的一种雏形。
委内瑞拉官员对此守口如瓶。

sentences.english: In fact, nary a word got out until Jobs' tumor had been removed.
sentences.chinese: 事实上大家一直守口如瓶，直至肿瘤被切除。
